BIO

Hi there, yes that's me,Chirag Chandak . I am a student from Indore(M.P) currently pursuing Bachelor of Engineering(B.E) in Computer Science(CSE) from Institute Of Engineering and Technology,DAVV,Indore. I am looking forward to be a fully established full stack web developer ( both backend and frontend ) in MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS) stack. I am actively looking to gain some industry exposure via internships. Go through the Contact section if you are interested in hiring someone who can give 100% every single time .
